name: The Silent Patient

name: Where the Crawdads Sing
author: Delia Owens
description: Kya Clark, the mysterious 'Marsh Girl', has lived alone in the wild for years. When a local man is found dead, Kya becomes the prime suspect. A beautifully written tale of mystery, love, and survival in the marshlands of North Carolina.
